meanings.definition: In a very hot and humid manner
meanings.sent1: The sun beat down swelteringly on the hikers as they climbed the mountain.
meanings.sent2: She felt swelteringly hot and sticky after spending the day at the beach.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked at the swelteringly hot weather outside and decided to take a nap in front of the fan.
meanings.sent4: The anticipation for the concert was swelteringly intense, making the fans restless with excitement.
meanings.sent5: The memory of the swelteringly humid jungle stayed with him long after he returned home.

meanings.sent1: The swelteringly hot room made it hard to focus on the task at hand.
meanings.sent2: The desert was swelteringly dry, with no relief in sight.
meanings.sent3: The swelteringly hot pavement made the ice cream melt faster than expected.
meanings.sent4: The tension in the room was swelteringly thick, making it hard to breathe.
meanings.sent5: The swelteringly hot metal of the car burned his hand when he touched it.
